Headline: Messenger RNA vaccines: Now proven against coronavirus, the technology can do so much more - CNN
Text: By Maggie Fox, CNNUpdated 1941 GMT (0341 HKT) June 1, 2021  (CNN)When the final Phase 3 data came out last November showing the mRNA vaccines made by Pfizer/BioNTech and Moderna were more than 90% effective, Dr. Anthony Fauci had no words. He texted smiley face emojis to a journalist seeking his reaction.Sign up here to get The Results Are In with Dr. Sanjay Gupta every Tuesday from the CNN Health team.
